org.hps.recon.tracking.kalman

Class RKhelix

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hps.recon.tracking.kalman.RKhelix

  • class RKhelix
extends Object
    Runge-Kutta propagation through the detector, including Gaussian MCS at silicon planes. This code is only to help with internal testing of the Kalman package and is not part of the fitting or pattern recognition.
